SCREEN AUTO AUTO 1.0

  VERTICALBOX
    LABELVALUE INST MECH RECEIVED_TIMESECONDS # COSMOS Received Time (UTC, Floating point, Unix epoch)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH RECEIVED_TIMEFORMATTED # COSMOS Received Time (Local time zone, Formatted string)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH RECEIVED_COUNT # COSMOS packet received count
    LABELVALUE INST MECH TIMESECONDS # Derived floating-point time since epoch in seconds
    LABELVALUE INST MECH TIMEFORMATTED # Derived time since epoch as formatted string
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSVER # CCSDS packet version number (See CCSDS 133.0-B-1)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSTYPE # CCSDS packet type (command or telemetry)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSSHF # CCSDS secondary header flag
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSAPID # CCSDS application process id
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSSEQFLAGS # CCSDS sequence flags
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSSEQCNT # CCSDS packet sequence count
    LABELVALUE INST MECH CCSDSLENGTH # CCSDS packet data length
    LABELVALUE INST MECH TIMESEC # Seconds since epoch (January 1st, 1970, midnight)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH TIMEUS # Microseconds of second
    LABELVALUE INST MECH PKTID # Packet id (The combination of CCSDS_APID and PACKET_ID identify the packet)
    LABELVALUE INST MECH SLRPNL1 # Solar panel 1 angle
    LABELVALUE INST MECH SLRPNL2 # Solar panel 2 angle
    LABELVALUE INST MECH SLRPNL3 # Solar panel 3 angle
    LABELVALUE INST MECH SLRPNL4 # Solar panel 4 angle
    LABELVALUE INST MECH SLRPNL5 # Solar panel 5 angle
  END
